alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mitchell, northwestern Colquitt and southern Worth Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Doerun, or 12 miles north of Moultrie, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norman Park, Doerun, Schley, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Minton, Scooterville, Livingston, Anderson City, Ticknor, Minnesota, Powelltown, Lester, Sigsbee, Pritchetts, Freeman, Poplar Arbor Church, New Elm, Greenough and Hartsfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
